LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ripper.label: Ripper
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ripper.description: The Ripper is a pretty good melee weapon, second only to the super sledgehammer in effectiveness. Thanks to its increased armor-piercing ability, it is not difficult to "pick" an enemy with the Ripper even in improved power armor. Ideal for combat in closed spaces and corridors.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ripper.tools.0.label: Teeth
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ripper.tools.1.label: Blade
